swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator

Class GrammarInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator.GrammarInfo

  • public class GrammarInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a Grammar extended by more information, like the set of nullable nonterminals and the FIRST sets. These values are cached for performance reasons
    Author:
    Gero
